descriptionSet.description: On this advertisement for John Roberts & Co. Limited, sole agents for Liberty Co., we see several pieces of furniture as well as some logos in the upper section. A small of advertised products can be seen as well as the address of the company advertising.

inscription.text: To the King by Appointment Sole Agents in India & the East for Liberty & Co. from London
John Roberts & Co. Limited Bombay for Furniture Carpets, Curtains & Linoleums Billiard Table Makers Showrooms Hornby Rd. Factory Marine Street Bombay
To the Queen by Appointment Sole Agents in India & the East for Liberty & Co. from London

location.name: Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art
